article.title: Joint Warfighting 2011 Coverage
article.author: Robert K. Ackerman
article.text: Robert K. Ackerman and Beverly Cooper will be co-blogging the AFCEA/USNI Joint Warfighting Conference from Virginia Beach next week. Go directly to the coverage at www.afcea.org/signal/signalscape/index.php/subject/joint-warfighting. Follow coverage on Twitter by using the hash tag #jwc11, or visit this link to see the Twitter stream in action.
